body: `substitute` handles newline insertion differently depending of whether it is passed a list (it will indent to current indent level), or a string (it won't do anything fancy). I added a comment.
body_html: substitute handles newline insertion differently depending of whether it is passed a list (it will indent to current indent level), or a string (it won't do anything fancy). I added a comment.
